description: Dify is an open-source LLMOps platform for building AI workflows, chatbots, and RAG applications with a visual no-code interface. Dify is an open-source LLM application development platform that allows teams to build AI workflows, chatbots, and knowledge base-powered applications through a visual interface. It supports RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation), workflow automation, multiple LLM providers, and a plugin system. Self-hostable with an active community. Highlights: Open-source and self-hostable. Visual workflow builder. RAG/knowledge base support. Multiple LLM provider support. Active community.
